argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_zmodfz | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ A e. NN ) -> ( N mod A ) e. ( 0 ... ( A - 1 ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( N mod A ) e. ( 0 ... ( A - 1 ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_nnz | |- ( A e. NN -> A e. ZZ ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> A e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 6 |  | #P_zmodcl | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ A e. NN ) -> ( N mod A ) e. NN0 ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( N mod A ) e. NN0 ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_nn0zd | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( N mod A ) e. ZZ ) |
| 9 |  | #P_zre | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. RR ) |
| 10 |  | #P_nnrp | |- ( A e. NN -> A e. RR+ ) |
| 11 |  | #P_moddifz | |- ( ( N e. RR /\ A e. RR+ ) -> ( ( N - ( N mod A ) ) / A ) e. ZZ ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_syl2anr | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( N - ( N mod A ) ) / A ) e. ZZ ) |
| 13 |  | #P_nnne0 | |- ( A e. NN -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 15 | 5, 8 | #P_zsubcld | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( N - ( N mod A ) ) e. ZZ ) |
| 16 |  | #P_dvdsval2 | |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ A =/= 0 /\ ( N - ( N mod A ) ) e. ZZ ) -> ( A || ( N - ( N mod A ) ) <-> ( ( N - ( N mod A ) ) / A ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 17 | 4, 14, 15, 16 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A || ( N - ( N mod A ) ) <-> ( ( N - ( N mod A ) ) / A ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 18 | 12, 17 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> A || ( N - ( N mod A ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_congsym | |- ( ( ( A e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ ( ( N mod A ) e. ZZ /\ A || ( N - ( N mod A ) ) ) ) -> A || ( ( N mod A ) - N ) ) |
| 20 | 4, 5, 8, 18, 19 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> A || ( ( N mod A ) - N ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( a = ( N mod A ) -> ( a - N ) = ( ( N mod A ) - N ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_breq2d | |- ( a = ( N mod A ) -> ( A || ( a - N ) <-> A || ( ( N mod A ) - N ) ) ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( ( N mod A ) e. ( 0 ... ( A - 1 ) ) /\ A || ( ( N mod A ) - N ) ) -> E. a e. ( 0 ... ( A - 1 ) ) A || ( a - N ) ) |
| 24 | 2, 20, 23 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ N e. ZZ ) -> E. a e. ( 0 ... ( A - 1 ) ) A || ( a - N ) ) |
